body:
Ok, this is ready for a re-review. 

- [Build from the PR](https://travis-ci.org/opensciencegrid/docs/builds/295512534) only runs the verification (`mkdocs build` and `linkchecker`
- [Build from a branch beginning with itb.*](https://travis-ci.org/opensciencegrid/docs/builds/295511453) runs both the verification and deployment to the itb

A few things:

1. All branches run `mkdocs build` and `linkchecker` before deployment, meaning that transient link failures can prevent deployment (I can change this)
1. ITB documentation is titled differently ([see top left](https://opensciencegrid.github.io/docs-itb/)) but I haven't thought about how to add a warning header/change the readthedocs theme color/whatever to differentiate it from production docs. I also haven't figured out how to modify `robots.txt` so that it isn't crawled
1. `doc-ci-scripts`'s `README.md` needs updated instructions
